entries.journal_entry_description: The Zssik are in need of a Wookiee who is on the inside of the resistance. The only way to do this is to trick one of them into a life debt. Boshaz has learned of the hiding location of a Wookiee, named Chawroo, wanted by the Blackscale for his illegal activities. The plan is simple, tip off Chawroo's hiding place to the Blackscale and then rescue him once they show up. Then the Zssik will use him to set up a meeting later on between you and the resistance.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Chawroo and his mate, Rawarok, are hiding out northwest of the main slaver camp. Boshaz said it was near the beach where the bolotaurs like to bath in the sun, across from a waterfall. The Zssik have tipped off his location to the Blackscale who are currently on their way to capture him. You need to get to Chawroo and rescue him from the Blackscale.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: The Blackscale will surely kill both Chawroo and his mate, Rawarok. Rescue him and kill all of the Blackscale Trandoshans.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Talk to Chawroo and get him to set up a meeting between you and the resistance. Have him send his messages to you through someone named Orooroo.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Go back to Boshaz and report your success in recruiting Chawroo to your cause.
